thread.title: Trail Blazers chat at noon with beat writers Joe Freeman and Mike Richman
thread.title_full: Trail Blazers chat at noon with beat writers Joe Freeman and Mike Richman | OregonLive.com

author: Joe Freeman | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Trail Blazers chat at noon with beat writers Joe Freeman and Mike Richman
text:
The Trail Blazers played their final exhibition game Thursday night in Los Angeles, falling 115-109 to the Clippers at the Staples Center.
The end of the regular season means one thing: The real games are right around the corner. The Blazers open the regular season Wednesday night at the Moda Center against the New Orleans Pelicans.
Since the exhibition season is over, we thought it was a good time to host a live chat. Surely you have some pressing questions about the Blazers.
Leave your questions in the comments section below any time between now and 1 p.m. Joe Freeman and Mike Richman , The Oregonian/OregonLive's Blazers beat writers, will stop by from noon to 1 p.m. to answer them as best as they can.
â€” Joe Freeman | jfreeman@oregonian.com | 503-294-5183 | @BlazerFreeman
